name: scrapped game project
description:
a shitty game i created in my free time, i run out of ideas (and i don't even know how scripts work) and i scrapped this project

i don't know if it work, i think it need gameguru on steam but i'm not sure. if it doesn't work, better for you, you saved yourself from a garbage tsunami

i added the tag "psychological-horror" because this game is so bad that it could damage your brain if you get exposed too much to this shit

there is a """"presskit"""" inside the game's folder, explore it at your own risk (not for viruses, i'm not a motherfu****, because there is offensive shit inside)
